name: SMS Viewer
tagline: View SMS messages from XML file generated by the Android app SMS Backup & Restore
body:
To use this, you'll need an XML file generated by the [SMS Backup & Restore](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.riteshsahu.SMSBackupRestore) app.

Click the "Demo" button above, browse to your XML file, and hopefully it works. Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
